page.title: 06Events in Wilton
page.content: Most of the events around Wilton take place at{Wilton House.}Each year there are the following events; {Antique Fair, Craft Fair, The South of {England Flower show, Wilton House {Horse Trials. In November, on the Saturday nearest the fifth, there is a{parade of guys. The parade starts at Wilton First School and finishes at the Recreation Ground. { The Retreat}is beaten each July at Erskine Barracks parade ground.This year,1985,the salute was taken by the only serving Field Marshal in the British army. In 1984 there was a millenium service for St.Edith one of the patron saints of the Wilton Parish Church.
